additions.text: Added an 'External' button in the edit section of world create menu, for IP-connecting to servers
Added a very faint sound when tools break, as well as a sound when flint and steel is used
Tapping and holding flint and steel on a creeper will cause the creeper to start explosion countdown
Added support for commands, however when attempting to use any command 'Error: Command not found' displays
Added chiseled quartz to survival mode
The moon now has different phases

changes.text: Clouds are now slightly darker, to correspond to the cloud color in PC
The orbit size of the sun and moon around the player has been increased, fixing a sun and moon size problem, as well as the sun appearing in front of the clouds
After eating food, a burp can be heard
Eggs can be thrown rapidly if you keep on tapping and holding the screen in both creative and survival
Each message displayed by the server now has a tag (e.g. 'Disconnected from server' now reads '<error> Disconnected from server')
Flint and steel now produces sound when used
Fire now has idle sounds when the player is within proximity

fixes.text: The Splash now changes every time a world is quit
The sun now disappears during night and vice versa
After eating one food item, player starts breaking things with food
Top half a door can replace a non-air block
The crafting menu don't show numbers for damaged tools!
Player can eat extra food while moving
No Sandstone stairs in survival mode
Armour and Health Icons obstruct sign menu
Armour does not drop when you die
